text: @benshapiro You're one to talk, Ben. You're a blind faith supporter of #Trump. A man who doesn't bother to educate himself on ANYTHING of importance as president. Greta Thunberg is smart & EDUCATED herself. She knows far more than #DonaldTrump about #COVID19. Remember... https://t.co/c31MpJ9Xay
